sqlMap.sql:
SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JEN_NM , A.JEN_USR_ID , A.JEN_USR_TOK , A.JEN_URL , A.JEN_DESC , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.DEL_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM9000 A WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND DEL_CD ='02'
AND A.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND A.JEN_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND A.JEN_DESC LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC

sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_JEN_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_JEN_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'JEN' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_JEN_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(JEN_ID) AS NEW_JEN_ID FROM STM9000 A WHERE 1=1 AND JEN_ID LIKE 'JEN' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO STM9000 ( LIC_GRP_ID, JEN_ID, JEN_NM, JEN_USR_ID, JEN_USR_TOK , JEN_URL, JEN_DESC, USE_CD, DEL_CD, REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #newJenId#, #jenNm#, #jenUsrId#, #jenUsrTok# , #jenUrl#, #jenDesc#, #useCd#, '02', SYSDATE , #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM9000 SET JEN_ID = #jenId# , JEN_NM = #jenNm# , JEN_USR_ID = #jenUsrId# , JEN_USR_TOK = #jenUsrTok# , JEN_URL = #jenUrl# , JEN_DESC = #jenDesc# , USE_CD = #useCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId#
UPDATE STM9000 SET DEL_CD = #delCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM STM9000 A WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT B.JEN_USR_ID ,B.JEN_USR_TOK ,B.JEN_NM ,B.JEN_URL ,B.JEN_ID ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM STM9003 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.JEN_ID = C.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = C.JOB_ID AND C.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# ) AS AUTH_CNT FROM STM9001 B , ( SELECT LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , JEN_ID , JOB_ID , FROM STM9002 WHERE PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID AND B.USE_CD ='01'
AND B.JEN_NM = #jobname#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STM9002 A ( A.PRJ_ID, A.JEN_ID, A.AUTH_GRP_ID ,A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #jenId#, #authGrpId# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM STM9002 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,A.JEN_ID ,A.AUTH_GRP_ID ,B.AUTH_GRP_NM ,B.AUTH_GRP_DESC ,B.CREATE_DT ,B.USE_CD ,B.USR_TYP ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', B.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM FROM STM9002 A, PRJ2000 B WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' ORDER BY B.ORD
SELECT COUNT(*) AS AUTH_GRP_CNT FROM STM9002 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
